titleStmt.title: The second part of Hero and Leander Conteyning their further fortunes. By Henry Petowe.
titleStmt.author: Petowe, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Purfoot, for Andrew Harris, and are to be sould at his shop, vnder the Popes head next to the Royall Exchange,
